amendment.description: To improve information sharing by the national intelligence centers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3762 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3762 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S10351-10358; text: CR S10351-10352) To improve information sharing by the national intelligence centers.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3762 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3762 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator Feingold.
